Class RecursiveFourierTransform

java.lang.Object
  FourierTransform
      RecursiveFourierTransform

public class RecursiveFourierTransform
extends FourierTransform

An implementation of the Fourier transform using the recursive fast Fourier transform (FFT) algorithm.

Author:
Justin Johnson

public ComplexNumber[] transform(ComplexNumber[] input)
Computes the discrete Fourier transform of the input data using the FFT algorithm.

Specified by:
transform in class FourierTransform
Parameters:
input - The complex numbers to be transformed. The length of input must be a power of two.
Returns:
An array of complex numbers containing the discrete Fourier transform of the input data.
